text: Horse and Rider is a 2014 sculpture by American artist Charles Ray. As of June 2015, the equestrian self-portrait was installed in the Art Institute of Chicago's South McCormick Courtyard, in the U.S. state of Illinois. The work is part of "Charles Ray: Sculpture 1997–2014". In 2019, Glenstone, a private museum located in Potomac, Maryland, began displaying Horse and Rider.
